analysis.key_quote: Reinstating the Schedule F framework under the new “Schedule Policy/Career” would threaten due process, invite political purges, deter top talent, undermine evidence-based policy, and damage public trust.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes Schedule F, highlighting concerns about politicization, due process, and the integrity of the civil service. It emphasizes the importance of nonpartisan civil servants and the negative consequences of the proposed rule.
